name: Google SearchWiki - Remove Only the Buttons
description:
This style is like style 12341 but does not remove "add a result" , "See all my SearchWiki notes" & "See all notes for this SearchWiki" from the page footer (bottom)

works on all google domains

BTW - If u have the AutoPager addon then add google.com to its "disable pages list"

user.name: LL25255252
user.about: I sometimes forget to check my userstyles RSS so if you want to report a problem send me a private message instead of starting a new discussion/review/question.
